title: The Grand Duke’s Fox Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Confident Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Strong Love Interests
author: Yulji   율지
description:
Noble status, dazzling appearance, and unparalleled talent.

The life of a princess, who had all these conditions that could not be modest, was solid.

I’m self-centered?

What is that?

It’s a life lived without caring about the regard of others.

“Look at this white fur. It’s like a snowball. Fluffy.”

Who dares to touch me frivolously?

No matter how much I shouted, I couldn’t reach the dazed-looking maids.

Eristella, the most capable woman of all time, was cursed and became a small fox.

***

It wasn’t too bad that the people of the Grand Duchy, who used to grind their teeth when I was a princess, showed affection.

“Eristella.”

The foe-like fiancée, who I most wanted to avoid, said,

“Should I call you by a proper name?”

Before he discovered my identity.>
